resources.string: Instantly ask or answer questions with folks around you. It\'s anonymous, so don\'t be shy.
To find questions and answers nearby, please enable access to your location.
To be notified of new questions and answers, please enable notifications. Go to app settings to choose which notifications to receive.

Be a good neighbor by following the rules.

 1. No personal info, especially phone numbers.
 2. No bullying or defaming.
 3. Repeated down-voting is bad.
 4. Be polite, helpful and informative.
 5. Eat more jelly donuts.
